title: S1 Ep25: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 13 - Bearing Witness
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 13 - Bearing Witness
description:
October 19, 2015 / The team discusses what a grand jury hearing is and the implications of one of the most important witnesses for Adnan Syed not appearing in court.

Additional music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Julian Sartorius, & Chris Zabriskie
